item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.QUICK_SEARCH() method performs the same action as the Quick Filter command.

section.title: Example
section.description: With the cursor on the firstname field of the Customer form of AlphaSports, the following script does a quick search using its current value.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.view("Customer Information") ptr.Quick_Search()
